data.text: Davide ná-woo ɠaaɓelagiti kaa:
«Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-Zɛnvui ɓɔɛa ga màaʋele,
Izilayɛle ná-GALAGI ɓɔɛa,
kulaʋɛ ga foloi, é ɠulazu sobui,
«Nà-pɛlɛyeɠei la ɠana ɓaa GALA gaazu?
Kɛlɛ nu ɲakaiti kpein kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ ɠaingiti ti ʋilisu ya,
Zɔi é pɔ é ti zeɠe,

Wɛlɛ Davide ná-kɔɔɠuluɓa wolaiti daaseigiti ba: Ma mɔungi ɠɛni ga Yosɛɓe-Ɓaseɓɛte, Taakemɔn mavofodai, é ɠɛni ga kɔɔɠuluɓaiti ta-lotuɠɔi. Daa ɠɛni ɓalaa ga Ɛsenee nui Adino. Tɔ ɠa é nu undɔsaʋa (800) ʋaani ʋɔɔma kɔɔɠɔ laa ɠila su.

Tɔun polumai ɠɛni ga Dodo ná-doun zunui Eleazaal, Aɠoa nui ta ná-dounloin. É ɠɛni kɔɔɠuluɓa saʋagɔiti saama, niiti ti yɛni Davide ʋa, siɛgi zu ti malimasakɛɛi leʋeni la ga Filisiti nuiti, naati gaalɛai ma ba kɔɔɠɔ vai ma, naazu Izilayɛle ɠɔɔʋɛbɛi ɗa ɠula ʋolu, ti ɗa lɔɔɠu.

Kɛlɛ Eleazaal loni kpaan, é yɛni Filisiti nuiti paazu, zeei ɓata boɠa zɔkpɔi ʋa ga kpɔlɔi. Naama voloi Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI fɔnifaama wola veeni Izilayɛle ya, kɔɔʋɛbɛi maaɓuɠani Eleazaal ʋa nɔ ga ti poomaiti kɔligiti seɠe.
Tɔun polumai ɠɛni ga Sama, Ɠalaal nui Agé ná-doun zunui. Filisiti nuiti ti ɠaalɛɛni ba Leyi. Tɔɠɔ ɓelei ta ɠɛni náʋɛ, Izilayɛle nuiti ti ɠɛni ʋelazu Filisiti nuiti ba.
Kɛlɛ Sama loni kpalagi zaama, é ná zo ʋolu, é ɗa Filisiti nuiti paa. Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI fɔnifaama wola veeni Izilayɛle ya.
Yeeta molo leʋei lɔɔzeizuʋɛ, kɔɔɠuluɓa ʋuusaʋagɔiti (30) saama, nu saʋagɔ yeini Davide ɠoba Adulame ʋugi zu, siɛgi zu Filisiti ɠɔɔɓɔgi gila ge ɠɛni ɠaalɛɛzu la ba Lefayime ʋɛtugi zu.
Davide ɠɛni názu ná-dɔɔɠu wosuʋɛ, siɛgi zu Filisiti ɠɔɔɓɔgi gila ge zeini la Ɓɛteleyɛme.
Ani wɔin ta Davide zoni nɔ sa, é ɠɛ ma: «Ɓɛ ɠa a ʋa bɛ̀ ga Ɓɛteleyɛme taa loaʋɛ ma ziɛyeɠei zu ɗɛi ta pɔ̀, gè kpɔle?»

Kɔɔɠuluɓa saʋagɔiti ti lɔɔni Filisiti ɠɔɔlaaɠai zu, ti ziɛi zaɠa ziɛyeɠei zu, é Ɓɛteleyɛme taa loaʋɛ. Ti ʋaani la, ti fe Davide ya, kɛlɛ é la ɠɛni kɛɛni, é ʋa kpɔle. É feeni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ, é pu ya zooi ma.
É ɠɛni ma: «Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI kìzo nii ɠɛɠala vai ɠɛɛ vai ma! Kulaʋɛ eɠɛ nà ɠɛ naama nuiti ma ɲamai ɓɔlezu, niiti ti ɠikulaai ti-yɛnvuiti su, ti li.» É ɠɛlɛni kpɔle vai ʋa.
Zoaɓe kɛɛɠɛloin Aɓisayi, Seluya ná-doun zunui ɠa é ɠɛni ga nu saʋagɔiti ta-ɠundiɠii. Tɔ ɠa é nu unsaʋagɔ (300) ʋaani ga ná-kpɛɛin. É lɔɠɔ zɔlɔɔni naazu nu saʋagɔiti saama.
Tɔɠɔɠulani ti saʋagɔ zaama, é ɠɛ ga ta-ɠundiɠii, kɛlɛ é la ɠɛni zeelini nu saʋagɔ mɔungiti su.

Ɓenaya, Yeɠoyada ná-doun zunui, é ɠɛni ga kɔɔɠuluɓa wolai ta ná-dounloun, nii é ɠɛni ga Kaɓeseyɛle nu, é lɔɠɔɠula faa wolaiti kɛɛni. Ɓenaya naa ɠa é Moaɓe ɠɔɔɠuluɓa wola felegɔ ʋaani. Tɔ ɠa ɓalaa, kɔɔlɛ vukɔi yɛni ʋuuzu foloi ta, é yeini ziɛyeɠei ɓomaʋɛ, é zalai ʋa.
Tɔ ɠa mɔnɔ é Ezipete nui ta ʋaani, nii gola maayikini, kpɛɛin zoni zea. Tukpɔ nɔ ɠa é ɠɛni zoni Ɓenaya ya, é ʋili Ezipete nui naa ma, é naa ná-kpɛɛin ɠula zea, é paa la.
Lɔɠɔɠula faa wolaiti kana Ɓenaya kɛɛni, Yeɠoyada ná-doun zunui, é lɔɠɔ wola zɔlɔɔni kɔɔɠuluɓa wola saʋagɔ ɠiligi niiti saama.
É lɛbiya wola zɔlɔɔni nu ʋuusaʋagɔiti (30) pɛ ba, kɛlɛ é la ɠɛni zeelini nu saʋagɔ mɔungiti su. Davide seini tɔ ɓɔɠɔi makɛ zalaʋusuiti unda.
Niiti ɓalaa ti ɠɛni nu ʋuusaʋagɔiti (30) saama: Zoaɓe kɛɛɠɛloin Azayɛle, Ɓɛteleyɛme nui Dodo ná-doun zunui Ɛlɛɠanan,
Sama ta Elika, Ɠalɔde nu felegɔiti,
Pelɛte nui Ɠelɛse, Tekoa nui Ikese ná-doun zunui Ila,
Anatɔte nui Aɓiyezɛɛl, Ɠusa nui Meɓunayi,
Aɠoa nui Salamon, Netofa nui Maɠalayi,
Netofa nui Ɓaana ná-doun zunui Ɠelɛɓe, Liɓayi ná-doun zunui Itayi, Giɓea nui Ɓɛnzamɛn yooi zu,
Pilaton nui Ɓenaya, Naɠalé-Gaase nui Yidayi,
Aalaɓa nui Aɓi-Alaɓon, Ɓaaleɠume nui Azamavɛte,
Saaleɓon nui Eliaɓa, Ɓené-Yasɛn, Zonatan,
Ɠalaal nui Sama, Alaal nui Salaal ná-doun zunui Ayiyame,
Aɠasebayi ná-doun zunui Elifelɛte, Maaka zunui ta dounloun ɠɛni de, Gilo nui Ayitofɛle ná-doun zunui Eliyame,
Kaalamɛle nui Ɠɛselayi, Alaɓe nui Paalayi,
Soɓa nui Natan ná-doun zunui Yigeyale, Gade nui Ɓani,
Amɔn nui Selɛke, Ɓeyelɔte nui Naalayi, nii é ɠɛni Seluya ná-doun zunui Zoaɓe ná-kɔɔɠɔ zɔɔlaiti seɠezu,
Ila ta Galɛɓe, Yetɛɛl nu felegɔiti,
ta Ɠɛte nui Ilii.
